website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the response for the Asics GT 2000 5 Lite-Show was positive. People liked this road shoe’s design and its apparently effective mechanisms. They were also happy with its stable underfoot platform. But there were those who had qualms about the midsole, stating that they were poorly implemented.
pros: Many consumers stated that the Asics GT 2000 5 Lite-Show was a comfortable shoe for daily use
Several testers reported that the design of this model was visually appealing
A purchaser who used this shoe for walking was delighted with the soft and responsive underfoot platform
The reflective overlays gained positive feedback because it allowed nighttime running sessions to be safer
The stability mechanism in the sole unit garnered fans as it responsibly corrected overpronation
Some runners affirmed the apparently correct width measurements of the GT 2000 5 Lite-Show
cons: A disgruntled runner complained that the midsole was stiff and unresponsive, causing some fatigue in the legs

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and comfortable but doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and comfortable but doesn't fit. they are over a 1/4" narrower than my last pair. I have been wearing nothing but this "2xxx" series since 2001 for jogging. This is the first pair out of the last 12 pairs (that I have worn out) that I wouldn't even try to run in. Not sure why they made them so much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: donnyspc

customer_reviews.title: Good every day running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good every day running shoe. If I need a break and want extra cushion I’ll switch to the gel nimbus for a day or so,, which is my other shoe. The GT 2000 sole wears longer, I can almost get 200 miles out of them. I use the lite show version for the winter months since it’s dark out when I run. Overall a solid trainer for the bulk of runs. You’ll want a lighter shoe for speed work.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for running
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected which means the usual 1/2 size up for this brand. Great shoe for running. Has helped with my IT band pain issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Dope night reflection colors
customer_reviews.text: These would be the one pair of shoes I'd choose to wear for the rest of my life if O could only wear one.. going to buy at least two of the exact same. In the sun they look black and cool but at night when the light hits them they have the coolest blue green yellow reflection logo and trim.badass. Get a full size bigger than normal so they fit just right trust me, I had to buy a second pair to figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Avalon

customer_reviews.title: Same fit, but is the sole more stiff this model?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the GT-2000 (and the previous 2100 series) for years. This is my first pair of the "5" and it feels like it's taking longer than normal to break them in. Fit is the same as it's ever been. The sole just feels more stiff than I remember with previous shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs about a half size large
customer_reviews.text: The GT2000 series is fantastic (every other version anyway)...The 5 is spot on. Support and lightweight. They don't last too long but greatness fades fast always...
customer_reviews.author: Bluetraveler

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort are great. The heel support is good
customer_reviews.text: Fit and comfort are great. The heel support is good. The replaceable insole allows me to use my orthotics. Extremely comfortable. Big toes eventually blow out. Just means it's time to get a new pair 'cause the outsole is usually just about gone by then too. I usually get about six months per pair walking a minimum of three miles a day; at least one day a week is greater than 5 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrider

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at first. Purchased 4-11-18. As of 8-18-18 I can not wear them anymore as the fabric that touches my Achilles’ tendon has torn. Now the cushion below that fabric is destroyed which has caused the shoes to become painful to wear. I filled out the warranty card and submitted a request for replacement through ASICS website. They state a 1 year warranty on footwear. We’ll see if they come through.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Everyday

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair in over two years. I run a mile a day and 100 floors on stair master every other. Lots of biking. Outsoles on 1st pair showing signs of age, still getting lots of use, but insoles, toe, heel and upper still like new. New ones fit well, seem like they will last as long as 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for moderate runs.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for moderate runs. I prefer little more cushioning but still like these.
customer_reviews.author: TerryD

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe... but the internal is different than the 4 series. I liked the lining in the 4 series more than 5 series
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and much easier and cheaper to deal with here on Amazon. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great running sneaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband only wears these for running, buy 2 pairs at a time
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Asics exclusively for 25 years. This shoe is a major disappointment and I am replacing them after 10 months. I run about 10 miles/week. The inside back of both shoes (yellow material) has worn and ripped, making them uncomfortable and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit a little small like all running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit a little small like all running shoes, so I ordered a half size larger. Perfect fit. Love the color. This is my second pair. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BOz

customer_reviews.title: Size up half a size
customer_reviews.text: Based on previous reviewers I rounded up half a size which was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie138

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are decent but toe wore hole through fabric on both shoes within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is my running shoe of choice and it seems to be the same shoe every time I buy
customer_reviews.author: Irateconsumer141

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heel cushion/fabric started breaking down after 3-4weeks. The medical post also provided too much support. I miss the 3's
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne E Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe asicis
customer_reviews.text: Great price great product love the asics my feet have never felt better
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good running shoe. Need to order 1 whole size up. Example if you’re usually a 8 order a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good shoes at a great price. 2nd time i order the SAME pair
customer_reviews.author: rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Its my 3rd pair!
customer_reviews.text: I already had two pairs so i knew i was getting quality....its a great workout shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are the worst from Asics only lasting for two months and two races,do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Goro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Been wearing this brand and style of shoes for years.
customer_reviews.author: smallboy

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Typical fit for Asics. Bought 1/2 size up and fits great. Very comfortable for 10 hr days on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: IslandLasse

customer_reviews.title: Great running sneaker...
customer_reviews.text: Run a little small, otherwise happy with the purchase. I’m a repeat buyer of the ASICS GT-2000 use them primarily in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: V. Almetica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a good fit now. I had to go one size up from my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable I had changed from ASICS to Nike and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I had changed from ASICS to Nike and now back to ASICS and I am glad I made the change back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Color could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The Asics GT-2000 is a great shoe. I have over probation and neutral arches so this shoe help prevent shin splints and arch pain. I marked it down one star because of the color the lime green that they use is dole and a little ugly, they should have went with more of a neon color. I bought some fabric spray paint to cover the ugly lime green now they look much better
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Keierleber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the GT2000-5. I just bought this one as a spare when the current ones wear out. Excellent shoe. My doctor recommended these because of the give in the front of the sole which helps my foot condition. Working as prescribed.
customer_reviews.author: grayhawk

product_meta.title: Asics Mens Gt-2000 5 Lite-Show Shoes
product_meta.description: Light up the running scene in the ASICS® GT-2000 5 Lite-Show! Predecessor: GT-2000 4. Support Type: Overpronation/Stability. Cushioning: High energizing cushioning/Lightweight, flexible response. Surface: Road. Differential: 10 mm. Reflective upper boosts visibility in low-lighting conditions. Breathable mesh and synthetic upper materials. Lace-up closure. Discrete eyelets disburse lace tension for optimal comfort. Plush tongue and collar. Heel Clutching System™ is made up of an exoskeletal heel counter that promotes an improved fit and increased support. ComforDry™ sockliner offers antimicrobial properties for a drier, healthier environment. I.G.S® features linked components to enhance the foot's natural gait from heel strike through toe-off. Dynamic DuoMax® System increases stability and support with reduced weight and enhanced platform comfort. Gender-specific cushioning features a lower-density top layer for better compression set. Rearfoot & forefoot GEL® cushioning systems work together to better attenuate impacting shock and allow the foot to move fluidly throughout the gait cycle. FluidRide™ midsole technology delivers a supreme combination of energy return and cushioning with reduced weight and lasting durability. Heel/Toe: 21 mm/11 mm. AHAR® rubber is strategically placed throughout high-wear areas of the outsole. Guidance Line® technology employs a vertical flex groove that decouples the tooling along the line of progression for maximum stride efficiency. Guidance Trusstic System® integrates Guidance Line construction to enhance gait efficiency while promoting mid-foot structural integrity. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
